scriptsComments.dev: Start the development server with live reload to preview and test the app during development.
scriptsComments.build: Generate an optimized production build of the app and output it to the 'dist' directory.
scriptsComments.lint: Check the app's codebase for syntax and style errors based on defined linting rules.
scriptsComments.preview: Serve the production build locally to test the app as it would appear in a deployed environment.
scriptsComments.generate-build-stats: Generates report visualizing the bundle structure, showing the size of each library and module.
